Point: Front camber offset relative to kingpin
MAX Y: Static camber angle - kingpin inclination angle
Additional from roll bar only. If no ARB

Point: Rear camber offset relative to kingpin
MAX Y: Static camber angle - kingpin inclination angle
Additional from roll bar only. If no ARB

Point: Polar moment of inertia about COG z-axis
MAX Y: If you don't have an exact value, use disk centered at COG with diameter = wheelbase and vehicle sprung mass
